stack_constructor.hpp

00001 #ifndef  BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DETAIL_STACH_CONSTRUCTOR_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DETAIL_STACH_CONSTRUCTOR_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00009 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER <= 1020)
00010 #  pragma warning (disable : 4786) // too long name, harmless warning
00011 #endif
00012 
00014 // collections_load_imp.hpp: serialization for loading stl collections
00015 
00016 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00017 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00018 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00019 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00020 
00021 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00022 
00023 #include <boost/aligned_storage.hpp>
00024 
00025 namespace boost{
00026 namespace serialization {
00027 namespace detail {
00028 
00029 // reserve space on stack for an object of type T without actually
00030 // construction such an object
00031 template<typename T > 
00032 struct stack_allocate
00033 {
00034     T * address() {
00035         return static_cast<T*>(storage_.address()); 
00036     }
00037     T & reference() {
00038         return * address();
00039     }
00040 private:
00041     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::aligned_storage<
00042         sizeof(T), 
00043         #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(__BORLANDC__,BOOST_TESTED_AT(0x560))
00044             8
00045         #else
00046             boost::alignment_of<T>::value
00047         #endif
00048     > type;
00049     type storage_;
00050 };
00051 
00052 // construct element on the stack
00053 template<class Archive, class T>
00054 struct stack_construct : public stack_allocate<T>
00055 {
00056     stack_construct(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version){
00057         // note borland emits a no-op without the explicit namespace
00058         boost::serialization::load_construct_data_adl(
00059             ar, 
00060             this->address(), 
00061             version
00062         );
00063     }
00064     ~stack_construct(){
00065         this->address()->~T(); // undo load_construct_data above
00066     }
00067 };
00068 
00069 } // detail
00070 } // serializaition
00071 } // boost
00072 
00073 #endif //  BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DETAIL_STACH_CONSTRUCTOR_HPP
